active_posts.title: Full Disclosure: CVE-2023-40231 / CVE-2023-40232 / CVE-2023-40233 / CVE-2023-40234 "All your mempool are belong to us"
active_posts.summary:
- A new transaction-relay attack, replacement cycling, threatens lightning channel fund security.
- Major lightning networks implemented fixes, while bitcoin applications may still be vulnerable.
- Full disclosure of the attack was made on October 16, 2023, urging continued vigilance.

active_posts.title: [Mempool spam] Should we as developers reject non-standard Taproot transactions from full nodes?
active_posts.summary:
- Bitcoin network faces congestion due to high volume side projects like BRC-20.
- Action like implementing BIPs may be considered if congestion persists.
- Critics oppose restricting freedom, but solutions for Taproot-related congestion are necessary.

active_posts.title: OP_Expire and Coinbase-Like Behavior: Making HTLCs Safer by Letting Transactions Expire Safely
active_posts.summary:
- The email addresses issues with HTLC-preimage paths and proposes using OP_Expire.
- OP_Expire and a soft-fork upgrade ensure transactions expire, akin to coinbase outputs.
- The proposal includes HTLC scripts having a deadline through an expiring pre-image branch.

active_posts.title: Full Disclosure: CVE-2023-40231 / CVE-2023-40232 / CVE-2023-40233 / CVE-2023-40234 "All your mempool are belong to us"
active_posts.summary:
- A new jamming attack threatens HTLC traffic in lightning channels.
- Lightning implementations mitigated the attack by aggressive rebroadcasting and other strategies.
- The situation necessitates research into pinning attacks and multi-app vulnerability.

active_posts.title: OP_Expire and Coinbase-Like Behavior: Making HTLCs Safer by Letting Transactions Expire Safely
active_posts.summary:
- The author proposes OP_Expire and the Coinbase Bit to solve HTLC-preimage expiry issues.
- OP_Expire fails transactions unless set conditions, like proper block height, are met.
- HTLCs could integrate OP_Expire to ensure secure, timely spending of preimages.

active_posts.title: LN Summit 2024 Organization
active_posts.summary:
- Antoine Riard proposes hosting the Lightning Network Summit in Africa in June 2024.
- He highlights Africa's potential and seeks feedback on his plans for transparency.
- Antoine invites collaboration and shares his event organization experience.
